price: Onlardan önce de tuzak kurdular, oysa bütün tuzaklar Allah’ındır, her nefsin ne kazandığını bilir. Kâfirler de bilecektir, (güzel) akibetin kimin olduğunu?!
arabic: وَقَدۡ مَكَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَكۡرُ جَمِيعٗاۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖۗ وَسَيَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡكُفَّٰرُ لِمَنۡ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqad makara alladhīna min qablihim falillahi al-makru jamīʿan yaʿlamu mā taksibu kullu nafsin wasayaʿlamu al-kufāru liman ʿuq'bā al-dāri
